section.heading: District life insurance benefits.
section.text: The District shall provide the group life insurance benefits set forth in § 1-622.07 to all employees of the District first employed after September 30, 1987, except those specifically excluded by law or by rule.

annotations.annotation: as added Oct. 1, 1987, D.C. Law 7-27, § 2(f), 34 DCR 5079
This section is referenced in § 1-610.63, § 1-622.16, and § 1-702.
